sentences.sContent: He has been studying archeology these thirty years.
sentences.sContent_eng: He has been studying archeology these thirty years.
sentences.sCn: 他这三十年来一直在研究考古学。

sentences.sContent: He was an expert in agriculture archeology, and medicine.
sentences.sContent_eng: He was an expert in agriculture archeology, and medicine.
sentences.sCn: 他是农业考古学的专家， 和药。

sentences.sContent: She's giving a paper on archeology at the National Museum this afternoon.
sentences.sContent_eng: She's giving a paper on archeology at the National Museum this afternoon.
sentences.sCn: 今天下午她将在国家博物馆宣读一篇关于考古学的论文。
